kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

test.name: ลบซัพพลายเออร์

kw.name: Login And Go To Suppliers Page
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//a[contains(text(),'จัดการซัพพลายเออร์')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//a[contains(text(),'จัดการซัพพลายเออร์')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${name} = ทดสอบซัพพลายเออร์ 1234
kw.arg: ทดสอบซัพพลายเออร์ 1234
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'ทดสอบซัพพลายเออร์ 1234' into text field 'id=supplier-search-input'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.arg: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
